comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Misspelled. Nickolson → Nicholson Field Marshal William Gustavus Nicholson, 1st Baron Nicholson, GCB (2 March 1845 — 13 September 1918), was a British Army officer who, in a half-century of service, rose through the ranks in India and the Boer War to the rank of Field Marshal. After retirement, he was called for final duty in World War I.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks trialsanderrors for the correction and full name. We'll update the record with this information.
